channel.title: CNN.com - RSS Channel
channel.description: CNN.com delivers up-to-the-minute news and information on the latest top stories, weather, entertainment, politics and more.
channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2024 Turner Broadcasting System, Inc. All Rights Reserved.

item.title: May 24, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: The United Nations' top court has ordered Israel to immediately halt its controversial military operation in the southern Gaza city of Rafah, further increasing international pressure on Israel over its war against Hamas.

item.title: University presidents testify as US colleges see more protests
item.description: A House committee held a hearing Thursday to address antisemitism on US college campuses after a wave of pro-Palestinian protests erupted at universities across the country.

item.title: Today's news in 10 minutes
May 22, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: Spain, Norway and Ireland announced plans to formally recognize a Palestinian state, in a move that is likely to bolster the global Palestinian cause but strain relations with Israel.

item.title: UK PM announces general election
item.description: UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak has called a snap general election for July 4.

item.title: May 21, 2024 Israel-Hamas war, Iran president death news
item.description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu blasted the charges brought by the International Criminal Court against himself and Israel's defense minister as "beyond outrageous" in an interview Tuesday with CNN's Jake Tapper.

item.title: Both sides rest cases without Trump testifying in hush money trial
item.description: Donald Trump's New York criminal hush money trial has adjourned until next Tuesday, when closing arguments are expected to take place.

item.title: The latest on Singapore Airlines turbulence incident
item.description: One person has died and at least 71 others were injured on board a Singapore Airlines plane that encountered severe turbulence on a flight from London to Singapore. Follow for live updates.

item.title: 'There's nothing like it,' says kayaker Dane Jackson after descending 300 feet down waterfalls
item.description: When Dane Jackson turned around and looked back at the tower of frothing water above him, he could scarcely believe what he had just experienced.

item.title: May 20, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: The Biden administration denounced efforts by the International Criminal Court to seek arrest warrants for top Israeli officials and Hamas leaders, saying the court's efforts put the terrorist organization and a top US ally on equivalent footing.

item.title: Dramatic day in court as defense begins to present case in Trump trial
item.description: Defense witness Robert Costello, a lawyer who advised Michael Cohen, is expected to resume his testimony Tuesday in Donald Trump's New York criminal hush money trial.

item.title: Iran's President Raisi killed in helicopter crash
item.description: Iran's President Ebrahim Raisi has died in a helicopter crash, the government has confirmed. Follow for live updates.

item.title: May 19, 2024 helicopter crash involving Iranian president
item.description: A helicopter carrying Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi crashed while he was visiting a northern region in the country Sunday, according to the Iranian state news agency IRNA.

item.title: May 19, 2024 - Israel-Gaza news
item.description: An Israeli airstrike on a refugee camp in central Gaza has killed at least 35 people, including seven children, according to hospital officials. Meanwhile, Israeli war cabinet divisions are spilling into the open.

item.title: Today's news in 10 minutes
Biden speaks at Morehouse College commencement
item.description: President Joe Biden gave a commencement speech at Morehouse, one of the country's preeminent historically Black colleges, as pro-Palestinian protests continue on campuses across the US.

item.title: Devastation in Gaza as Israel wages war on Hamas
item.description: Gaza faces a "dire" food situation as barely more than 300 aid trucks have entered the strip since Israel began its offensive in Rafah, a UN agency said in a report published Friday. Follow live updates.

item.title: May 17, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: The Israeli military said Friday it recovered the bodies of three hostages — Shani Louk, Amit Bouskila, and Itshak Gelernter — in the Gaza Strip.

item.title: World No. 1 golfer Scottie Scheffler arrested outside PGA Championship
item.description: World No. 1 golfer Scottie Scheffler was arrested and charged with a felony and other counts Friday morning outside the PGA Championship in Louisville, Kentucky. Follow here live updates.

item.title: May 16, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: Israel called South Africa the "legal arm" of Hamas on Thursday after it accused Israeli forces, in remarks at the International Court of Justice, of failing to protect civilians in the southern Gaza city of Rafah.

item.title: Trump defense grills Michael Cohen in hush money trial
item.description: The cross-examination of Michael Cohen, the prosecution's key witness in the Donald Trump criminal hush money trial, will resume Monday. Closing arguments could begin as early as Tuesday.

item.title: May 16, 2024 - Russia's war in Ukraine
item.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin has met Chinese leader Xi Jinping in Beijing, emboldened by the survival of his wartime economy and Russia's advances in Ukraine.

item.title: Today's news in 10 minutes
Slovakia's prime minister expected to survive after shooting
item.description: Slovakian Prime Minister Robert Fico is expected to survive after being shot five times in what officials described as a politically motivated assassination attempt.

item.title: May 15, 2024 - Russia's war in Ukraine
item.description: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken announced $2 billion in military financing for Ukraine as Russia is pushing into northeastern part of the country.

item.title: May 14, 2024 - Russia's war in Ukraine
item.description: Antony Blinken met with Volodymyr Zelensky in Kyiv earlier Tuesday, where the Ukrainian president told the US secretary of state that Ukraine urgently needs more air defenses.

item.title: If you think you can't focus for long, you're right
item.description: Your attention span has shrunk by nearly two minutes in the past 20 years, driven in part by technology's hold over your work and home life, experts say. Here's how to stay focused so you can get things done.

item.title: May 14, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: Amid signs that Israel may launch a full-scale incursion in Rafah, aid agencies are warning any escalation in the southern Gaza city risks exacerbating the already deteriorating humanitarian situation.

item.title: Trump defense cross-examines Michael Cohen in hush money trial
item.description: Donald Trump's defense will continue to cross-examine Michael Cohen on Thursday as it aims to discredit the prosecution's key witness in the former president's criminal hush money trial in New York.

item.title: May 13, 2024 Israel-Hamas war
item.description: The Biden administration has assessed that Israel has amassed enough troops on the edge of Rafah to move forward with a full-scale incursion in the coming days, but senior US officials are currently unsure if Israel has made a final decision to carry out such a move.
